main event: A civilian reported seeing a round metallic object in the sky, which they believed to be a flying saucer, in May 1964.
interesting points: The witness was uncertain about the exact date and time of the sighting., The object was estimated to be 1,000 to 1,500 feet high., The object appeared to be stationary and was described as silvery or stainless steel colored., The witness observed the object hover and then take off at a steep angle without making any noise., The author expressed belief in the existence of flying saucers and speculated about their origin.
witness description: a civilian who witnessed the event near Penn Station
